description:
Goh`s Raboot is the evolved form of Goh`s Scorbunny. It evolved when learning how to use the move Ember. Goh got a Wishing Star just outside of Professor Magnolia`s lab and Sonia crafted it into a Dynamax Band for him. When he was confronted by Oleana`s Guard, Goh`s Raboot Dynamaxed to defend Goh and Sonia.
Goh`s Cinderace is the evolved form of Goh`s Raboot. It evolved during a battle against Oleana`s Milotic.
name: Rabifutto (Gou)
